title: Trainee - IT Support
short_description: Move2USAJobs.com LLC is a pioneering platform dedicated to bridging the gap between job seekers and USA visa-sponsored employment opportunities. We are not just a job portal; we are a gateway to the American Dream for many aspiring professionals worldwide. Our services extend beyond job matching, offering comprehensive support in visa processing, legal advice, and community building among entrepreneurs.
description: –û –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –∏ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µMove2USAJobs.com LLC is a pioneering platform dedicated to bridging the gap between job seekers and USA visa-sponsored employment opportunities. Please bear in mind before applying.–ë–æ–Ω—É—Å—ãAn on-site internship¬†A dynamic and supportive team environment where you can grow professionally.Exposure to the global job market and visa sponsorship processes.A certificate of completion at the end of the traineeship.Opportunities for future employment with Move2USAJobs.com LLC based on performance.–î–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏–∏We will need documents confirming your education degree¬†(a bachelor's) or documents proving your student status.¬†

title: Backend Developer (Web3/Crypto Software)
short_description: Titan Investment Technologies is a market maker in the cryptocurrency market with coverage of most CEX and DEX exchanges on the global market. We specialize in improving the efficiency of blockchain projects by creating token liquidity, developing and implementing trading execution strategies.¬†The business directions of the company is market making, algorithmic execution, trading solutions for DEX and other advisory, marketing, listing services. But now¬†we are in the process of developing proprietary software and¬†advanced trading¬†algorithms.¬†And we must say right away our company is at the early startup stage.¬†Keep this in mind before sending your CV and generally further cooperation with us.¬†We are looking for young people to create something disruptive in the crypto market.¬†The internship involves the development of crypto trading software and the creating of trading algorithms for exchanges.
description: –û –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –∏ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µTitan Investment Technologies is a market maker in the cryptocurrency market with coverage of most CEX and DEX exchanges on the global market. sending your CV and generally further cooperation with us.¬†We are looking for young people to create something disruptive in the crypto market.¬†The internship involves the development of crypto exchanges (anti-snipe protection,¬†backrunning execution, volume management, limit orders)Work with third-party APIs (crypto exchanges, software products)To take a seat in creating trading algorithms for DEXs¬†and¬†later for CEXsTo help develop modular integrations for blockchains, decentralized and centralized exchangesWriting unit tests and¬†conducting code reviewsThe primary task is to help¬†writing trading algorithms for market-making on DEX¬†and develop trading softwareYou can¬†consult with people with expertise in IT and crypto fintechWishes for the future candidate:Preference is given to the winners of the physics and mathematics Olympiads, especially¬†All-RussianIn particular, the last year students from the top five universities from technical faculties (MIPT, Moscow State University, HSE, Bauman Moscow State Technical University, MEPhI) are consideredA great desire to work in a startup without bureaucracy and other boring thingsRequirements:Fluency in EnglishUnderstanding of Ethereum, smart contracts and other L1 blockchains is a plusKnowledge of DEX (Uniswap,¬†Raydium and etc.) Solidity experience is a plus, but not required.Great understanding of algorithmic trading is a plus, but¬†not necessaryIt can be a plus, experience with cloud platforms such as AWSBig interest in quantitative finance, HFT, crypto assets, DeFi¬†protocols¬†and Market MakingThe most valuable thing is experience and you can get a unique development experience.¬†The internship implies a close relationship with the rest of the development team and the founders.–£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ãPosition:¬†Part-timeYou will have to work part-timeInternship¬†can be combined with studying at the universityWork experience can be up to 6 monthsLocation:¬†desirable MoscowFully Remote,¬†but in the future in the Moscow office.–î–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏–∏If you are interested in this vacancy, we will be happy to consider your candidacy. Please send your CV and cover letter with your relevant experience in developing crypto financial software (infrastructure) / HFT trading algorithms / Market Making / any DeFi solutions.
